fullDescription.intro: Downloads document from a certain database which can be specified in the dialog, i.e.: PubMed. After sending the specified query to the database and downloading the resulting documents, the documents will be parsed and deleted if it is specified in the dialog.
fullDescription.option: The query which is send to the specified database.
After a click at the button, the number of results related to the specified query will be shown.
The database to download the resulting documents from, i.e.: PubMed.
The number of maximal resulting documents to download and parse.
The directory to save the documents to.
If checked, the files containing the documents will be deleted after parsing.
The category of the documents to set.
The type of the documents to set.

ports.dataOut: An output table which contains the parsed document data.
